titles.title: Encouraging States to adopt laws that set clear guidelines for contact protocols for personal emergency response systems used by the Nation's senior citizens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: 9/17/2009--Introduced. Calls for states to adopt laws that set clear guidelines for contact protocols for personal emergency response systems used by senior citizens.
